extendedInfo.description: Simply Swim is a leading online swimwear and equipment store that sells everything you need for Swimming and delivers it straight to your door. We offer competitive prices, excellent service and great customer service.

reviews.comment: A great app they have some really awsome swim gear but the app kept force closing on me every time. Had to uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: app does not display same products as website
reviews.comment: and the checkout is via website, not in the app.   Their mobile app has similar issues (ie database of products is not the same as the full website)  pointless...
reviews.author: A Google User
